title: Tremulous Hack (THZ v4.1b) (Linux/Windows)
description:
Hack for Tremulous. (I dont using that.) (Slogen: Cheat to WIN.)


Features:
---------
* Based On Newest Compatible SVN Revisions
* Bugfixes and Speed Improvements
* Enhanced Radar System / Chat Bubble Support
* Game Modification in Master Server List
* Enhanced Graphics and Rendering Bloom Support
* Spectator Detection and Multiple ESPs
* Enhanced &#039;human-aim&#039; Next Generation Aimbot
* New Zooming Modification
* Configurable Adaptive Precise Prediction
* Prioritizable Targeting
* Specialized Triggerbot
* GUID Spoofing
* Pure Server Safe
* Instant Radar Updates
* Standard Wallhack
* Chamhack|Glowshells
* Removed Client Side Damage/Weapon Kick
* Less Basilisk &#039;glue&#039; effect
* And much more to be added...


Requests in THZ v5.0:
---------------------
* Icon Radar -> Show class and weapon type pictures instead of squares
* In-game menu -> Alternative menu not based on quake cvars.
* Auto-Update -> Check a .txt file for the current version number and then tell user where to dl new client.
* New team overlay
* Goon spit-aimbot -> detect if your a lvl 3 goon and spit above target to hit?
* TAB displays all player classes all the time
* Spectator Detection
* Color coded ESP

Links:
------
* http://tremulous.net (Tremulous Official Website)
* http://fusionthz.net (Tremulous Hack Zone Website)


Enjoy.
